item.title: The Power of PowerShell for Enhanced Cybersecurity Operations and Compliance
item.category: "PowerShell" , "Cybersecurity" , "Operations" , "Compliance" , "Automation" , "STIG SRG Requirements" , "NSACyber Guidance" , "Windows Systems" , "Blue-Team Defense" , "Scripts" , "Tools" , "C Sharp projects"
